name: SPEED CLUSTER 2017 Re-EDITION
description:
Exercise your brain to the soothing sounds.

Speed Cluster is a simple game with a familiar feel. It's the perfect enjoyment for those who aren't usually into games.

Give this breezy, relaxed experience a try!

How-to:

The rules are simple. Slide cards to stack them in sequential order. There's a timer bar that ticks down, but stacking cards will refill it. It's game over when the timer bar reaches zero.
